ULTR18.title: Brother from Another Planet
ULTR18.description: An alien arrives on Earth claiming to be the brother of humanity. While he claims that the Science Patrol does not have Earth's best interest in mind, Ultraman begins attacking Earth.

RBBT11.title: The Man Upstairs
RBBT11.path: ../Ray Bradbury Theater/Ray Bradbury Theater - 11 The Man Upstairs.m4v
RBBT11.description: Young boy investigates whether his loving grandmother's new strange lodger is a vampire.

LITB044.title: The Lost Watch
LITB044.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 044 The Lost Watch.mp4
LITB044.description: While the older boys play baseball, Beaver and his friend Larry watch from the sidelines while minding the players' wallets, jackets and watches. But when the belongings are reclaimed after the game, bully Lumpy Rutherford's watch appears to be missing and he gives Beaver two days to find it ... or else!

DRHI09.title: Montgomery, AL
DRHI09.description: Scientist Percy Julian overcomes racial barriers, Claudette Colvin refuses to give up her bus seat months before Rosa Parks's famous protest, and Joe Louis fights German boxer Max Schmeling.

ULTR17.title: Passport to Infinity
ULTR17.description: Mysterious space rocks spell trouble for the Science Patrol. When the rocks are stored together they combine to create a giant rock that can manipulate the fourth dimension.

OFUK09.title: Party
OFUK09.description: David takes on a new look that, not surprisingly perhaps, reflect his new boss Neil's tastes. His already over-inflated ego gets a boost when a training firm offers him a handy sum for a 15 minute training presentation.

SPRA18.title: Girl Daredevil (part 1)
SPRA18.description: The Mach 5 team befriends Twinkle Banks, an acrobat whose family circus is being rendered bankrupt by a gang of crooks.

ACGS09.path: ../All Creatures Great and Small/All Creatures Great and Small - 09 Semper Progrediens.m4v
ACGS09.title: Semper Progrediens

LITB043.title: Beaver and Chuey
LITB043.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 043 Beaver and Chuey.mp4
LITB043.description: Even though they don't speak each other's language, Beaver gets along fine with his new Spanish friend, Chuey, until sneaky Eddie Haskell tricks him into insulting Chuey with a newly learned Spanish phrase.

RT66018.title: Sleep on Four Pillows
RT66018.description: Tod and Buz, in the Los Angeles area, while Tod is taking a computer class at UCLA and Buz sells cosmetics, aid a "girl in danger". She claims the mafia are after her to locate her "Don" father who they plan to kill. Tod and Buz have an uneasy series of adventures before the true story comes out.

MSTK0109.title: Project Moonbase
MSTK0109.description: Joel and the Bots watch two more Commando Cody episodes and a film about a sabotaged space station. They also introduce their new product SPACOM to the Mads.

SOKO09.title: Tentaclon: An Electric Monster
SOKO09.description: Emperor Guillotine gives Dr. Over a spaceship equipped with all kinds of scientific weapons. After landing at the earth, Over sends an electric monster called Sparky to the ground of a soccer game and kidnaps all 30,000 spectators as hostages.

BSG109.title: The Living Legend (part 1)
BSG109.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 10 - The Living Legend (part 1).m4v
BSG109.description: While suffering from a fuel shortage, The Galactica finds the supposedly lost Battlestar Pegasus, led by the legendary Commander Cain.

LITB042.title: Ward's Problem
LITB042.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 042 Ward's Problem.mp4
LITB042.description: Ward promises to take Wally fishing and Beaver to the third grade's student-father picnic before realizing that both events are on the same Saturday.

LISP44.title: The Golden Man
LISP44.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 44 The Golden Man.m4v
LISP44.description: Penny befriends a toad-looking alien, whose race is fighting against the much more pleasant-looking golden aliens. One of them isn't what they seem?

LISP43.title: The Dream Monster
LISP43.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 43 The Dream Monster.m4v
LISP43.description: Doctor Smith trades the Robinsons' emotions - in exchange for a trip home.

METR1927.title: Metropolis
METR1927.description: Set in a futuristic urban dystopia and follows the attempts of Freder, the wealthy son of the city master, and Maria, a saintly figure to the workers, to overcome the vast gulf separating the classes. Silent.

CADF10.title: The Raven in the Foregate
CADF10.description: An unpopular Puritanical priest new to Shrewsbury refuses to give a pregnant young girl absolution resulting in her apparent suicide.

LRSS09.title: The Talk Show
LRSS09.path: ../Larry Sanders Show, The/Larry Sanders Show, The - 09 The Talk Show.m4v

PATV08.title: The Deception
PATV08.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 08.mp4
PATV08.description: Galen, Virdon and Burke befriend a chimpanzee named Fauna, the blind daughter of a human friendly ape who was killed by a band of vigilante apes known as the Dragoons. Unaware that Burke is human, Fauna falls in love with him, as Galen and Virdon hunt down the Dragoons, only to discover that Fauna's uncle is one of them.

RT66017.title: Fly Away Home (part 2)
RT66017.description: DAMAGED, SHORT. Tod tempts the fates by training for crop dusting with the "jinx".The doomed pilot financially saves the dusting business by taking on a dangerous assignment and brings the owner of the business back to reality.Buz,ready to end his life's search,is turned down.He vows to look for her (and perhaps finds her in Season 3).

LISP42.title: Wreck of the Robot
LISP42.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 42 Wreck of the Robot.m4v
LISP42.description: The robot is stolen to create more robots so they can conquer the Earth.

CON109.title: Countdown
CON109.description: The cannon changes the way fortresses are built, leads to maps, limelight, incandescent light, celluloid, guncotton are a few of the interconnected inventions along the way to our modern world.

ICLD09.title: Zeus, by Jove!
ICLD09.description: Tiberius summons Caligula and his cousin Gemellus to Capri, declaring them his joint successors.

TPOD11.title: France: October, 2089 AD
TPOD11.description: Will, Henry and Beanpole, driven by hunger, steal food from a village festival and find themselves in trouble.

LISP41.title: A Visit to Hades
LISP41.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 41 A Visit to Hades.m4v
LISP41.description: An alien harp is found. It's a gateway to a planet which is - or isn't hell.

LITB041.title: Eddie's Girl
LITB041.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 041 Eddie's Girl.mp4
LITB041.description: June unwittingly jeopardizes Wally's friendship with Eddie Haskell after she accepts a dance invitation for Wally from Eddie's current crush, Caroline Cunningham.

FWLT09.title: Waldorf Salad
FWLT09.description: Customer dissatisfaction with the Fawlty Towers dining experience comes to a head when an insistent American comes for a stay.

ULTR08J.path: ../Ultraman (Japanese, Engligh Subtitled)/Ultraman - 08 The Lawless Monster Zone.mp4
ULTR08J.title: The Lawless Monster Zone

LITB045.title: Her Idol
LITB045.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 045 Her Idol.mp4
LITB045.description: To stop his friends from teasing him and prove that he doesn't have a crush on classmate Linda Dennison, Beaver is pressured into calling her a nasty name

STAN09.title: Once Upon a Planet
STAN09.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 09 Once Upon a Planet.m4v
STAN09.description: Upon returning to the amusement park planet, the Enterprise crew finds the computer, which generates the planet's sophisticated robots, running amok, with the caretaker nowhere to be found.

FETM08.title: We Interrupt this Program
FETM08.path: ../From the Earth to the Moon/From the Earth to the Moon - 8 We Interrupt This Program.m4v
FETM08.description: The Apollo 13 mission as seen through the reporting of two newscasters, highlighting the changing character of news coverage.

8FADCF12.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/Ghidrah, the Three Headed Monster (Godzilla #5, 1964, dubbed).mp4
8FADCF12.title: Ghidrah, the Three Headed Monster (Godzilla #5, 1964, dubbed)
